title: (x) "Lakai Limited Footwear" payful display caps - hand made {Stephen}
content:
Can anyone tell me what font this is?

I love the way it looks and would love to use it in an upcoming project.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Afbeelding 4.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203236/http:/typophile.com/files/Afbeelding%204.png) | 359.1 KB |

 [‹ please help with what font this is?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203236/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50344 "Go to previous forum topic") [War is Over. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203236/http:/www.typophile.com/node/50343 "Go to next forum topic")
author: DoubleThink

comments.content: These letters were hand made. See some fonts that are similar to this style at the bottom of this post on [Linzie Hunter](http://web.archive.org/web/20081009203236/http:/typographica.org/001117.php).
